title: 820-3332-A Black Screen/Kernel Panic
message:
Hello. 

This macbook came in like 1 year ago because of distorted image on the screen, in that time I resolder U8900 and reballed the GPU. 

The computer worked fine for that period of time and now it is randomly crashing: black screen followed by a restart. It says "panic (CPU...") 

Ive red about the CPU fets issue on this board, but never experienced the issue. Do you think this can be the issue? 


Thanks a lot!

title: 820-3332-A Black Screen/Kernel Panic
message:
No idea where did you read such thing; this board doesn't use FDMF6808N chips.

Test disabling GPU...
